subtasks: Open the nut to expose the barb
Wiggle the tubing onto the exposed barb
Tighten the nut
Remove the fitting by reversing the above steps
Recommending the Sprinkler Warehouse website for product inquiries
Encouraging subscription to the YouTube channel
Identifying as the Sprinkler Warehouse Pro
